"Bot requires code grant" when inviting Bots

When inviting a bot, you may encounter the following screen:

This is caused by the owner of the bot misconfiguring the configuration of their bot.

You will therefore not be able to invite the bot. Please find us on Discord and tell us about where you found the error.

For bot owners

Go onto the Discord Developers page, and uncheck the "Require OAuth2 Code Grant" option. This will rectify the problem your users have inviting your bot.
